pages.text: Rootgrasp Spell Essence contains the concentrated magical properties of earth binding. Extracted from the Rootgrasp Flower Bloom, it embodies the steadfast nature of earth and the binding power of roots.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: When cast directly, Rootgrasp Essence slows down nearby entities by conjuring magical vines that temporarily bind them to the earth.$(br2)Mana Cost: [value]$(br)Single-use when cast directly

pages.title: Extraction
pages.text: The extraction process requires a Rootgrasp Flower Bloom and earthy catalysts to maintain the binding properties during transformation.

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: - Direct casting for crowd control$(br)- Grafting onto a Living Staff$(br)- Creating traps and binding mechanisms$(br)- As a component in stability-focused magical items$(br)- Ground reinforcement in magical construction
